name: Ultima 7: Forge of Virtue
description:
Ultima 7: Forge of Virtue is a RPG game developed by Origin Systems. It came out on 07-09-1992. It was published by Electronic Arts.
You can play Ultima 7: Forge of Virtue on PC.
John Watson, Prem Krishnan and Richard Garriott produced the game. Ken Demarest and Richard Garriott directed the game. It was scored by Andrew Morris.
